original_text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth, and hid his lord's money.
korean_text: 한 달란트 받은 자는 가서 땅을 파고 그 주인의 돈을 감추어 두었더니

sentences.original_text: But he that had received one
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 한 개를 받은 그 사람은

sentences.original_text: went and digged in the earth
